body:
crashlooping on my cluster:

```
I0523 22:11:45.809653       1 dns.go:352] Received DNS Request:galera.cluster.local., exact:false
I0523 22:11:45.809675       1 dns.go:385] records:[], retval:[], path:[local cluster galera]
I0523 22:11:46.064002       1 dns.go:352] Received DNS Request:kubernetes.default.svc.cluster.local., exact:false
I0523 22:11:46.064113       1 dns.go:385] records:[0xc82030e930], retval:[{10.0.0.1 0 10 10  false 30 0  }], path:[local cluster svc default kubernetes]
I0523 22:11:46.064450       1 dns.go:352] Received DNS Request:kubernetes.default.svc.cluster.local., exact:false
I0523 22:11:46.064476       1 dns.go:385] records:[0xc82030e930], retval:[{10.0.0.1 0 10 10  false 30 0  }], path:[local cluster svc default kubernetes]
I0523 22:11:46.064915       1 dns.go:393] Received ReverseRecord Request:1.0.0.10.in-addr.arpa.
I0523 22:11:46.816377       1 dns.go:352] Received DNS Request:galera.e2e-tests-petset-kqc7g.svc.cluster.local., exact:false
I0523 22:11:46.816435       1 dns.go:385] records:[0xc82030f810], retval:[{10.180.3.3 0 10 10  false 30 0  }], path:[local cluster svc e2e-tests-petset-kqc7g galera]
panic: runtime error: slice bounds out of range

goroutine 151 [running]:
panic(0x1677b20, 0xc820014020)
    /usr/local/google/home/abshah/.gvm/gos/go1.6/src/runtime/panic.go:464 +0x3e6
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/skynetservices/skydns/msg.Domain(0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
    /usr/local/google/home/abshah/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/skynetservices/skydns/msg/service.go:132 +0x2b0
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/skynetservices/skydns/server.(*server).SRVRecords(0xc8204601c0, 0xc82011f830, 0x30, 0xe00010021, 0xc82011f830, 0x30, 0x7faaca000200, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, ...)
    /usr/local/google/home/abshah/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/skynetservices/skydns/server/server.go:580 +0xfb7
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/skynetservices/skydns/server.(*server).ServeDNS(0xc8204601c0, 0x7faaca4e35f0, 0xc8204ead80, 0xc82011d7a0)
    /usr/local/google/home/abshah/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/skynetservices/skydns/server/server.go:392 +0x3558
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/miekg/dns.(*ServeMux).ServeDNS(0xc820464210, 0x7faaca4e35f0, 0xc8204ead80, 0xc82011d7a0)
    /usr/local/google/home/abshah/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/miekg/dns/server.go:209 +0xbb
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/miekg/dns.(*Server).serve(0xc820452410, 0x7faaca4e20e0, 0xc82011f7d0, 0x7faaca4e20b8, 0xc820464210, 0xc82012ae00, 0x41, 0x200, 0xc820022640, 0xc82012e5a0, ...)
    /usr/local/google/home/abshah/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/miekg/dns/server.go:576 +0x7ef
created by k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/miekg/dns.(*Server).serveUDP
    /usr/local/google/home/abshah/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/miekg/dns/server.go:530 +0x3e1
```
